Package opennlp.tools.langdetect

Class LanguageDetectorModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • opennlp.tools.util.model.BaseModel
      • opennlp.tools.langdetect.LanguageDetectorModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, ArtifactProvider
    public class LanguageDetectorModel
extends BaseModel
    The LanguageDetectorModel is the model used by a learnable LanguageDetector.
    See Also:
    LanguageDetectorME, Serialized Form
